DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to describe the level of non-descent for the testis.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The failure of one or both testes of a male fetus to descend from the abdomen into the scrotum during the late part of pregnancy. If not surgically corrected in early childhood, males may be at increased risk for testicular cancer later in life._A position on a scale measuring intensity, quality, or amount.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The failure of one or both testes of a male fetus to descend from the abdomen into the scrotum during the late part of pregnancy. If not surgically corrected in early childhood, males may be at increased risk for testicular cancer later in life.

Concepts.definition: The failure of one or both testes of a male fetus to descend from the abdomen into the scrotum during the late part of pregnancy. If not surgically corrected in early childhood, males may be at increased risk for testicular cancer later in life.

Property.preferredDefinition: A position on a scale measuring intensity, quality, or amount.  (NCI)

Concepts.definition: A position on a scale measuring intensity, quality, or amount.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The failure of one or both testes of a male fetus to descend from the abdomen into the scrotum during the late part of pregnancy. If not surgically corrected in early childhood, males may be at increased risk for testicular cancer later in life._A position on a scale measuring intensity, quality, or amount._Category; used informally to mean a class of things.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The lower region of the anterior abdominal wall located laterally to the pubic region.

Concepts.definition: The lower region of the anterior abdominal wall located laterally to the pubic region.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An elevated level or position or degree; greater than normal in degree or intensity or amount.: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.: A method of feeling with the hands during a physical examination. The health care provider touches and feels the patient's body to examine the size, consistency, texture, location and tenderness of an organ or body part.

Concepts.definition: An elevated level or position or degree; greater than normal in degree or intensity or amount.
An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.

A method of feeling with the hands during a physical examination. The health care provider touches and feels the patient's body to examine the size, consistency, texture, location and tenderness of an organ or body part.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
